#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int a[10][10],b[10][10],ans=0,n;
void way(int i,int j)
{
	if(i==n&&j==n)
		ans++;
	b[i][j]=1;
	//cout<<b[i][j+1]<<" "<<a[i][j+1];
	//cout<<i<<" "<<j<<"\n";
	if((i+1)<=n&&b[i+1][j]==0&&a[i+1][j]==0)
		{way(i+1,j);}
	if((i-1)>=1&&b[i-1][j]==0&&a[i-1][j]==0)
		{way(i-1,j);}
	if((j+1)<=n&&b[i][j+1]==0&&a[i][j+1]==0)
		{way(i,j+1);}
	if((j-1)>=1&&b[i][j-1]==0&&a[i][j-1]==0)
		way(i,j-1);
	b[i][j]=0;
}
int main()
{
	int i,j;
	cin>>n;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
			{cin>>a[i][j];
			 b[i][j]=0;}
	way(1,1);
	cout<<ans<<"\n";
	return 0;
}
